headline: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) Partners With Accenture, Drops From Russell Indexes
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) recently announced a significant partnership with Accenture Federal Services, aimed at enhancing AI deployment for the U.S. federal government. This event, coupled with their removal from the Russell Midcap Index, occurred against a backdrop of Palantir's share price rising 54% over the last quarter. The increase in Palantir's Q1 2025 net income and improved earnings per share, alongside a broader market rally where major indexes like the Nasdaq hit new...

headline: Robinhood expands to EU, Palantir rebounds, Joby Aviation surges
summary: Market Catalysts host Brad Smith tracks today’s top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Robinhood (HOOD) shares jump after announcing it will bring US stock and ETF tokens to European users. Palantir (PLTR) rebounds on a new artificial intelligence (AI) partnership with Accenture (ACN) Meanwhile, Joby Aviation (JOBY) surges as it nears commercial readiness with aircraft deliveries to the United Arab Emirates. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
